verses.roman:
mahāprabhura iṅgita govinda saba jāne
kālidāsere dila prabhura śeṣa-pātra-dāne

synonyms: mahāprabhura-of Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; iṅgita-indications; govinda-His personal servant; saba-all; jāne-knows; kālidāsere-unto Kālidāsa; dila-delivered; prabhura-of Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; śeṣa-pātra-the remnants of food; dāne-presentation.
translation: Govinda understood all the indications of Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu. Therefore he immediately delivered the remnants of Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu's food to Kālidāsa.
